# jamfpro_allowed_file_extension (Resource)


## Example Usage
```terraform
resource "jamfpro_allowed_file_extension" "allowed_file_extension_001" {
  extension = ".thing1"
}

resource "jamfpro_allowed_file_extension" "allowed_file_extension_002" {
  extension = ".thing2"
}
```
